bibl.title: Dietary Hellenization or Ecological Transformation? Beer, Wine and Oil in Later Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Expanded version of the paper read at the congress. - Introduction. - The case for and against dietary hellenization: beer. - The case for and against hellenization: wheat. - The interplay of beer, wine and wheat. - The interplay between the various types of oil and wheat. - The third century and after. - Concluding remarks.
